review: Just an invaluable product in today's modern world of gadgetry and personal entertainment. I've experienced very few glitches or hang-ups so far, and it works marvelously with Netflix and YouTube on both Android and Windows 7, which is the bulk of how I use my Chromecast. For $35 this product is a no-brainer.
author: Dan Pantz "djc_77"

review: A great product which adds appreciated functionality to my Android devices.  I watch Netflix/Hulu/YouTube etc on several devices connected to my TV.  I use Chromecast often as it is ready to watch must faster than with my Xbox or PC.  I found the YouTube app with Chromecast allows you to line up a queue of videos.  With all of the content on YouTube you can queue a long list of interesting shows.  I look forward to updates and additional apps that include Chromecast support.
